meanings.sent1: The testers checked the new video game for bugs.
meanings.sent2: The testers at the lab carefully examined the prototype.
meanings.sent3: The testers joked about being professional button pushers.
meanings.sent4: The testers were like detectives, uncovering hidden flaws.
meanings.sent5: The testers' job is to find mistakes and make things better.

meanings.sent1: The electronic testers beeped when the circuit was complete.
meanings.sent2: The quality control department used various testers to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The testers sat quietly on the shelf, waiting for their turn.
meanings.sent4: The testers hummed with power as they analyzed the data.
meanings.sent5: The bright red tester stood out among the other tools in the box.

meanings.definition: A sample of a product given out for testing.
meanings.sent1: The company sent out testers of the new shampoo to gather feedback.
meanings.sent2: The testers of the fabric swatches were distributed to select customers.
meanings.sent3: The testers of the energy drink were a hit at the office party.
meanings.sent4: The testers of the software update revealed some unexpected results.
meanings.sent5: The small testers allowed users to try the product before buying.
